metadata.Title: CVE-2012-4394 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in apps/files/js/filelist.js inownCloud before 4.0.5 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary webscript or HTML via the file parameter.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-4394` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

owncloud - 4.0.6debian-0ubuntu1
owncloud-mysql - 4.0.6debian-0ubuntu1
owncloud-pgsql - 4.0.6debian-0ubuntu1
owncloud-sqlite - 4.0.6debian-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: owncloud package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.0.6debian-0ubuntu1').
